org.trianacode.gui.hci

Class TrianaToolBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JToolBar
            • org.trianacode.gui.hci.AbstractToolBar
              • org.trianacode.gui.hci.TrianaToolBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, Actions

    public class TrianaToolBar
extends AbstractToolBar
implements Actions
    The Triana toolbar, placed at the top of the Main application window. This is implemented as a tear-off window.
    See Also:
